briefdescription.para: Global last-error string buffer (process-wide, owned by this TU).
Store the last error message into the global static buffer.
Set the last error string directly (C ABI).

detaileddescription.para: This is intended for other CUDA translation units to report errors without defining their own ie_cuda_last_error_string symbol.

briefdescription.para: Clear the last error string (C ABI).

memberdef.argsstring: (const float *W, const float *x, float *y, const float *bias, size_t rows, size_t cols)
memberdef.name: ie_gemv_rowwise_f32_kernel

briefdescription.para: Row-wise GEMV kernel: each thread computes one output row.

detaileddescription.para: This is a correctness-first kernel intended to validate real GPU execution. Performance work (tiling, vectorization, shared memory, etc.) can follow.

briefdescription.para: Decode log2(u8, q3) scale encoding to FP32 (device).
Decode a signed 4-bit integer stored in a nibble (device).

memberdef.argsstring: (const uint8_t *W_blocks, const uint8_t *W_scales, size_t scale_bytes, const float *x, float *y, size_t rows, size_t cols, const uint16_t *bias_bf16)
memberdef.name: ie_gemv_q4_0_f32_kernel

briefdescription.para: Row-wise GEMV kernel for Q4_0 weights and FP32 activations.
Check if CUDA is available by querying device count.

detaileddescription.para: Returns non-zero if at least one CUDA device is available.

simplesect.para: 1 if at least one CUDA device is visible, 0 otherwise.

memberdef.argsstring: (int device_ordinal, char *out_name, size_t name_cap, char *out_driver, size_t driver_cap)
memberdef.name: ie_cuda_init

briefdescription.para: Initialize CUDA on a given device and return device/driver info.

detaileddescription.para: Initialize CUDA for a given device ordinal and return basic identity strings.
This forces runtime/driver initialization via cudaFree(0) so preflight checks can observe real driver activity.

parameterdescription.para: Output buffer for device name (may be NULL).
Output buffer for driver/runtime versions (may be NULL).

simplesect.para: Device pointer on success, NULL on failure.

detaileddescription.para: Free device memory allocated by ie_cuda_malloc().

memberdef.argsstring: (void *dst, const void *src, size_t nbytes, ie_cuda_copy_kind_t kind)
memberdef.name: ie_cuda_memcpy

briefdescription.para: Copy memory between host/device with an explicit kind.

memberdef.argsstring: (const float *dW, const float *dx, float *dy, size_t rows, size_t cols, const float *dbias)
memberdef.name: ie_cuda_gemv_f32

briefdescription.para: Launch a simple row-wise GEMV in FP32 and synchronize.

detaileddescription.para: Launch a GEMV FP32 kernel: y = W*x + bias (bias optional).

parameterdescription.para: Device pointer to row-major weights (rows x cols).

memberdef.argsstring: (const uint8_t *dW_q4, const uint8_t *dW_scales, size_t scale_bytes, const float *dx, float *dy, size_t rows, size_t cols, const uint16_t *dbias_bf16)
memberdef.name: ie_cuda_gemv_q4_0_f32

briefdescription.para: Launch a Q4_0 GEMV kernel and synchronize.

detaileddescription.para: Launch a GEMV Q4_0 kernel: y = dequant(Wq4) * x (+ optional BF16 bias).

briefdescription.para: CUDA runtime implementation for the engine's C ABI CUDA wrapper layer.

detaileddescription.para: This translation unit is compiled with NVCC and provides a strict C ABI so that C code can invoke CUDA functionality without including CUDA headers.

Error handling:
A single process-wide static buffer stores the last CUDA error string.
ie_cuda_last_error_string() exposes it via C ABI.
ie_cuda_set_last_error_string() and ie_cuda_clear_last_error() are also exported so other CUDA translation units can report errors without defining duplicate symbols.
